What we did Working principles

Motivation - Insight #12

People can be influenced to adopt risk

We believe...

We can get people to recognise the benefits of a risk process, because we’ve already done it.
We do it by working with people to show how it benefits them.

Because we've seen and heard...

“We have had to work on the Risk Register, it used to be just a list. We now do a ‘Deep Dive’ which is far more beneficial”

The Deep Dive is starting to evolve with Owners and Co-ordinators working together to improve it

Would I have created a Deep Dive to manage Risk if there was already a tool to do this? ~ Probably not!

I was motivated to improve how we manage risk and created a Deep Dive

User need #17

As a risk colleague
I need to understand why I’m being asked to work in a certain way.
So that I can recognise the benefits and can act on it accordingly.

User need #18

As a risk colleague
I need help to follow the correct processes and procedures,
so that I do my job right
